definition: circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in

sentences.english: The heavy pigs from piggery pulled out is not an easy thing.
sentences.chinese: 把笨重的肥豬從豬圈裏拖出來是一件不容易的事。

sentences.english: There are many pigs in the pigsty.

sentences.chinese: 可你的臥室還象個豬圈。

sentences.english: His wife went into the outhouse, which in old houses was always right next to the pigpen.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子去上廁所，廁所就在豬圈旁的舊屋子裏。

sentences.english: I landed in the pig-pen on top of Aphrodite, the mother pig.
sentences.chinese: 掉在豬圈上面，就是母豬阿佛洛狄特的屋頂上。

sentences.english: Next thing is, the mail room is a pigsty.
sentences.chinese: 下一件事，收發室像個豬圈。

sentences.english: There are several swine in the piggery.
He laid big stones at his house and began to build a pigsty.
sentences.chinese: 他把大石塊堆在房子前開始壘豬圈。

sentences.english: But he paints life in a pigsty in such a way that we feel we have been there far too long.
sentences.chinese: 但是他描述的豬圈生活讓我們覺得非常熟悉。

sentences.english: Pigs whose sties had been washed with river water also were reported to have died.
sentences.chinese: 那些呆在用河水沖洗過的豬圈裏的豬據說也死了。

sentences.english: The pigs pushed their noses through the bars of their pen.
sentences.chinese: 這些豬用鼻子拱豬圈的欄杆。

sentences.english: Towards evening, pig be a nass of bruises is brought back piggery.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚，豬體無完膚被帶回豬圈。

sentences.english: This place is a pig sty.
sentences.chinese: 這個地方像豬圈一樣的亂。

sentences.english: “Her garage was a pig sty, ” he once said.
sentences.chinese: “她的車庫就是個豬圈，”有一次他曾說。

definition: yaodong (a kind of cave dwelling in the Loess Plateau in northwest China)/CL:孔[kong3]
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
display of severity immediately on taking office/(fig.) initial show of strength
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
lit. dragons and snakes mingle (idiom)/fig. a mix of good people and scumbags
